field.name: summary
field.value: Unexpected exception thrown using TransactionScope but not using SessionScope...

field.name: description
field.value: As code attached, i have created two test methods that updates a list of objects, the first using a SessionScope and the second using a TransactionScope: both methods perform the same operations, but the second fail at the validation of the second object... Please take a look at the source for more explainations, the code is very trivial.
